name: Faurest
description:
What you'll be doing:

  • Use your gun and grappling hook to navigate a dark cavern.
  • Race to collect the keys throughout the world. With all three keys, you can finally lay this demon to rest... if it doesn't grow too powerful while you take your time retrieving them.
  • Burden yourself with the sap of cursed trees, so that you can empower yourself at sacred groves.
  • Make a pact (or three) with the demon you came here to slay. 

How you'll play:

  • Use WASD to move your character. Jump using Space bar or W.
  • Use the mouse to aim your gun and grappling hook. Left mouse click to fire your gun. Right mouse click to fire your grappling hook at any solid surface (or enemy!)
  • Press E to interact with keys and sacred or cursed trees.
  • Press G to teleport back to safety. There is no penalty for doing so.

Please comment with any feedback!
